channel.title: Gamblerscape 742
channel.description:
Welcome to Gamblerscape 742
Home Page : http://www.gamblerscape.org/home/index.php?/
Forums : http://gamblerscape.org/community/
Gamblerscape caters for all types of different players from pvm players to hardcore pvpers to even just players that want to skill and chill. We even have 5 different game modes to choose from with different exp rates, the harder the exp the better the drop rates!
Features of the server include:
All skills working from 1-99 with working 120 dung :
Custom items
From Custom Bosses!
Master Skillcapes for 200m exp!
All Curses and Spells fully working!
Ability to switch the item look to the oldschool style:
Fight Kiln
Castle Wars
Clan Wars
5 Custom bosses with Custom loot
Corp
Fully working construction with the ability to visit other players houses!
Working Squeel of Fortune
Daily Challenges for rewards
Working clue scrolls
Along with many many more features!
So come and be a part of our active community today! www.gamblerscape.org
